text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
The Arima Kinen is always a big event.<n>The
entrants are chosen by popular<n>vote, so the
lineup invariably ends up<n>being a who's who of
the best racers of<n>the year.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
But this year, the atmosphere in the<n>stands is a
little different.

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
Symboli Rudolf is finally taking on<n>senior-year
racers... I can't wait to see<n>how she does!

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text:
Don't get your hopes up. Some of these<n>racers are
almost finished with their<n>careers. One of them's
gonna snag the<n>win, I figure.

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text:
Still, she's the Emperor, right? She'll be<n>top three
for sure.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Ah, you're back. How's the mood out<n>there?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Haha... Are they now? How flattering.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
All eyes are on me. They hope that I will<n>measure
up favorably against the<n>seniors, as well as the
most talented of<n>my contemporaries.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: But still, I have yet to capture their<n>hearts.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
Symboli Rudolf came second in the fan<n>vote,
losing out to a senior-year<n>Umamusume, and it
seems to be<n>weighing on her mind.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
A simple poll cannot truly measure the<n>people's
faith in me, of course, but the<n>result does
symbolize my current<n>standing quite aptly.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Many believe that the seniors'<n>experience
presents an obstacle that I<n>cannot hope to
overcome.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Which means that they doubt my<n>abilities. And
such doubts have only one<n>remedy.
choice_data_list: Let's show them how strong you really are!
Let's show them how strong you really are!
